Specimen Type: Whole blood, buccal swab, or saliva
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with a wide range of clinician-requested genetic conditions.
Container: EDTA (lavender-top) tube for blood; Ambry Genetics buccal swab/saliva collection kits
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, real-time PCR machine, capillary electrophoresis system, DNA sequencer
